meanings.sent1: My grandparents are septuagenarians and love to tell stories from their youth.
meanings.sent2: The retirement community is filled with septuagenarians who enjoy morning walks.
meanings.sent3: The septuagenarians at the bingo night were surprisingly competitive.
meanings.sent4: The garden party was a sea of septuagenarians, their laughter filling the air.
meanings.sent5: The septuagenarians gathered for their weekly book club, eager to discuss the latest novel.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals aged between 70 and 79.
meanings.sent1: The study focused on the health of septuagenarians living in urban areas.
meanings.sent2: The charity organization provides support for septuagenarians in need of assistance.
meanings.sent3: The group of septuagenarians on the hiking trip surprised everyone with their energy.
meanings.sent4: The conference room was filled with septuagenarians, each sharing their unique life experiences.
meanings.sent5: The local newspaper featured a story about a group of septuagenarians starting a community garden.
